title: NoSleep Podcast S12E23
description:
It's episode 23 of Season 12. On this week's show we have tales about bad places to be at the wrong time.
  
  "The Cecily Marsh Interview " written by C.K. Walker (Story starts around 00:02:20) Produced by: Phil Michalski TRIGGER WARNING! Cast: David – David Cummings, Cecily – Erika Sanderson
 "Sanguine Libations Part 2" written by C.M. Scandreth (Story starts around 00:30:30) Produced by: Jesse Cornett TRIGGER WARNING! Cast: Katie – Jessica McEvoy, Brian – Jesse Cornett, Silas – Graham Rowat, Mystery Buyer – David Cummings
 "I Work at a Bad Motel" written by Jon Grilz (Story starts around 01:05:30) Produced by: Jeff Clement TRIGGER WARNING! Cast: New Night Manager – Jeff Clement, Old Night Manager – Mick Wingert, Phone Woman – Alexis Bristowe, Sally – Nichole Goodnight
 "The Hell Halls of Holy-Ween" written by Jennifer Winters (Story starts around 01:31:40) Produced by: Phil Michalski TRIGGER WARNING! Cast: Jackie – Nichole Goodnight, Amanda – Jessica McEvoy, Amira – Addison Peacock, Evie/ Demon Toddler Boy/High School Girl – Erika Sanderson, Leslie – Alexis Bristowe, Sister Cobb – Sarah Thomas, Brother Joe Cobb – Mike DelGaudio, Cole – Elie Hirschman
 "The Things Cassie Saw" written by Charlotte Ledville (Story starts around 01:54:45) Produced by: Phil Michalski TRIGGER WARNING! Cast: Samantha – Addison Peacock , Cassie – Jessica McEvoy , Corey – Peter Lewis , Mom – Nikolle Doolin, Dad – David Cummings, Teacher – Sarah Thomas, Weather Announcer – Dan Zappulla
 Click here to learn more about the voice actors on The NoSleep Podcast  
 Click here to learn more about C.K. Walker  
 Click here to learn more about C.M. Scandreth  
 Click here to learn more about Jon Grilz  
  Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
 Musical score composed by: Brandon Boone
 "Sanguine Libations" illustration courtesy of Jen Tracy

content:encoded:
It's episode 23 of Season 12. On this week's show we have tales about bad places to be at the wrong time.

 

"The Cecily Marsh Interview " written by C.K. Walker (Story starts around 00:02:20)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
TRIGGER WARNING!
Cast: David – David Cummings, Cecily – Erika Sanderson

"Sanguine Libations Part 2" written by C.M. Scandreth (Story starts around 00:30:30)
Produced by: Jesse Cornett
TRIGGER WARNING!
Cast: Katie – Jessica McEvoy, Brian – Jesse Cornett, Silas – Graham Rowat, Mystery Buyer – David Cummings

"I Work at a Bad Motel" written by Jon Grilz (Story starts around 01:05:30)
Produced by: Jeff Clement
TRIGGER WARNING!
Cast: New Night Manager – Jeff Clement, Old Night Manager – Mick Wingert, Phone Woman – Alexis Bristowe, Sally – Nichole Goodnight

"The Hell Halls of Holy-Ween" written by Jennifer Winters (Story starts around 01:31:40)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
TRIGGER WARNING!
Cast: Jackie – Nichole Goodnight, Amanda – Jessica McEvoy, Amira – Addison Peacock, Evie/ Demon Toddler Boy/High School Girl – Erika Sanderson, Leslie – Alexis Bristowe, Sister Cobb – Sarah Thomas, Brother Joe Cobb – Mike DelGaudio, Cole – Elie Hirschman

"The Things Cassie Saw" written by Charlotte Ledville (Story starts around 01:54:45)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
TRIGGER WARNING!
